item.title: Boat Airdopes 381
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Equipped with 7mm rhythmic dynamic drivers for immersive HD sound. Perfectly designed for the outdoors with IPX5 Sweat and Water Resistance. Seamless connectivity with Bluetooth v5.0, so that nothing stops your day. Style your workouts with only the best true wireless earbuds. With a battery capacity of 500mAh for each earbud, indulge in blissful audio experience for up to 4 hours in a go. The ergonomically designed TWS Airdopes 381 are truly dope!
item.content:encoded: Equipped with 7mm rhythmic dynamic drivers for immersive HD sound. Perfectly designed for the outdoors with IPX5 Sweat and Water Resistance. Seamless connectivity with Bluetooth v5.0, so that nothing stops your day. Style your workouts with only the best true wireless earbuds. With a battery capacity of 500mAh for each earbud, indulge in blissful audio experience for up to 4 hours in a go. The ergonomically designed TWS Airdopes 381 are truly dope!

item.title: Boat Airdopes 171
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Plug into the music of your choice with Best Bluetooth earbuds boAt Airdopes 171 to enjoy your playlist in a truly wireless way. With its 380mAh carry cum charging case it offers a playtime of up to 10 Hours and a battery capacity of 43mAh for each earbud, indulge in a blissful audio experience for up to 3 Hours in a go. It has the IPX4 rated shield to offers resistance against water and dust scares. The True Wireless Earbuds (TWS) Airdopes 171 come equipped with 6mm drivers for immersive sound. The stereo calling feature lets the user indulge in smooth and clear chats over calls. Its latest Bluetooth v5.0 offers seamless instant connectivity. One can access the instant voice assistant by just a single press via the Multifunction Button control
item.content:encoded: Plug into the music of your choice with Best Bluetooth earbuds boAt Airdopes 171 to enjoy your playlist in a truly wireless way. With its 380mAh carry cum charging case it offers a playtime of up to 10 Hours and a battery capacity of 43mAh for each earbud, indulge in a blissful audio experience for up to 3 Hours in a go. It has the IPX4 rated shield to offers resistance against water and dust scares. The True Wireless Earbuds (TWS) Airdopes 171 come equipped with 6mm drivers for immersive sound. The stereo calling feature lets the user indulge in smooth and clear chats over calls. Its latest Bluetooth v5.0 offers seamless instant connectivity. One can access the instant voice assistant by just a single press via the Multifunction Button control

item.title: Boat Airdopes 402
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Ride through the highest waves of Nirvana on your boAt Airdopes 402 wireless earbuds. Drown in your favourite rhythm with its immersive 10mm drivers and boAt Signature Sound. Its IWP™️ technology and Bluetooth v5.2 offers a seamless and truly wireless listening experience. Let nothing come in between you and your music with its massive 30HRS of playback. Even if you manage to exhaust your battery, ASAP charge empowers you with another 60 minutes of playback within 5 minutes of charge. Let your thoughts echo clear and loud with ENx™️ technology that ensures crystal clear voice delivery. Navigating through your music and calls is a breeze with its Easy Touch Controls. Do it all and more with Airdopes 402
item.content:encoded: Ride through the highest waves of Nirvana on your boAt Airdopes 402 wireless earbuds. Drown in your favourite rhythm with its immersive 10mm drivers and boAt Signature Sound. Its IWP technology and Bluetooth v5.2 offers a seamless and truly wireless listening experience. Let nothing come in between you and your music with its massive 30HRS of playback. Even if you manage to exhaust your battery, ASAP charge empowers you with another 60 minutes of playback within 5 minutes of charge. Let your thoughts echo clear and loud with ENx technology that ensures crystal clear voice delivery. Navigating through your music and calls is a breeze with its Easy Touch Controls. Do it all and more with Airdopes 402

item.title: Boat Airdopes 131
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Sleek. Comfortable. Stylish. And a Splash of Incredible Colours. Bring alive your favourite sounds with these true wireless earbuds Equipped with 13mm drivers for the magical boAt signature sound. Designed for supreme ease with Insta Wake N’ Pair technology that auto connects the moment it’s out of the case and Type C Charging. TWS earbuds to drown all the sounds you don’t need and live every moment. With a battery capacity of 40mAh for each earbud, indulge in a blissful audio experience for up to 3 hours in a go. Tap into instant wireless functionality with optimum Bluetooth V5.0
item.content:encoded: Sleek. Comfortable. Stylish. And a Splash of Incredible Colours. Bring alive your favourite sounds with these true wireless earbuds Equipped with 13mm drivers for the magical boAt signature sound. Designed for supreme ease with Insta Wake N’ Pair technology that auto connects the moment it’s out of the case and Type C Charging. TWS earbuds to drown all the sounds you don’t need and live every moment. With a battery capacity of 40mAh for each earbud, indulge in a blissful audio experience for up to 3 hours in a go. Tap into instant wireless functionality with optimum Bluetooth V5.0

item.title: Boat Airdopes 121 V2
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Plug into your sound with boAt Airdopes 121v2 True Wireless earbuds to enjoy your playlist in a truly wireless way. With Bluetooth v5.0 and Insta wake N' pair technology you just have to take out earbuds from the case and they automatically pair with your device in an instant. Its 380mAh carry cum charging case offers an additional playtime of up to 10.5 Hours. With a battery capacity of 380mAh for each earbud, indulge in blissful audio experience for up to 3.5 Hours per charge. The TWS Airdopes 121v2 comes equipped with 8mm drivers that pump out immersive sound. The stereo calling feature lets the user indulge in smooth and clear chats over calls. One can access the instant voice assistant by just a single press via the Multifunction Button control. It comes in three stylish colours: Active Black, Midnight Blue and Cherry Blossom to uplift the vibes like never before.
item.content:encoded: Plug into your sound with boAt Airdopes 121v2 True Wireless earbuds to enjoy your playlist in a truly wireless way. With Bluetooth v5.0 and Insta wake N’ pair technology you just have to take out earbuds from the case and they automatically pair with your device in an instant. Its 380mAh carry cum charging case offers an additional playtime of up to 10.5 Hours. With a battery capacity of 380mAh for each earbud, indulge in blissful audio experience for up to 3.5 Hours per charge. The TWS Airdopes 121v2 comes equipped with 8mm drivers that pump out immersive sound. The stereo calling feature lets the user indulge in smooth and clear chats over calls. One can access the instant voice assistant by just a single press via the Multifunction Button control. It comes in three stylish colours: Active Black, Midnight Blue and Cherry Blossom to uplift the vibes like never before.

item.title: Airdopes 413 ANC
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Make your surroundings disappear with Airdopes 413 ANC and its Active Noise Cancellation Technology. ENx™ Technology provides an incomparable calling experience. Get the best audio experience one can get while controlling your Airdopes 413 ANC with touch gesture controls, Insta Wake N’ Pair technology and Ambient Mode. Plug-in and listen to the #SoundThatMatters!
item.content:encoded: Make your surroundings disappear with Airdopes 413 ANC and its Active Noise Cancellation Technology. ENx Technology provides an incomparable calling experience. Get the best audio experience one can get while controlling your Airdopes 413 ANC with touch gesture controls, Insta Wake N’ Pair technology and Ambient Mode. Plug-in and listen to the #SoundThatMatters!

item.title: Airdopes 148
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Let the noise of the world drown as you jam to your rhythm with Airdopes 148. Equipped with 8mm drivers, these dope wireless earbuds make your playlist sound better with crystal clear audio quality and powerful bass. Experience seamless calling and be clearly heard with ENxTM Technology. That is not all, ASAPTM Charge technology empowers you with 75 minutes of playback with just 5 minutes of charging. With IPX4 Sweat and Water Resistance, there's no stopping you from listening to your workout mix while breaking a sweat. Moreover, its IWPTM Technology and Quick Response Touch Controls ensure you can answer calls and switch music without interrupting your flow. Go ahead, your perfect audio match is right here.
item.content:encoded: Let the noise of the world drown as you jam to your rhythm with Airdopes 148. Equipped with 8mm drivers, these dope wireless earbuds make your playlist sound better with crystal clear audio quality and powerful bass. Experience seamless calling and be clearly heard with ENxTM Technology. That is not all,  ASAPTM Charge technology empowers you with 75 minutes of playback with just 5 minutes of charging. With IPX4 Sweat and Water Resistance, there’s no stopping you from listening to your workout mix while breaking a sweat. Moreover, its IWPTM Technology and Quick Response Touch Controls ensure you can answer calls and switch music without interrupting your flow. Go ahead, your perfect audio match is right here.

item.title: Airdopes Genesis
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Start your journey of a truly immersive wireless experience with Airdopes Genesis. Featuring a playback of 54 hours and ASAP™ Charge it gets you a never-ending immersive experience with boAt Signature sound coming from its powerful 13mm drivers. With seamless in-ear detection and quad mics with ENx™ Technology, get flawless clear calling whether it's a work call or personal chit-chat. Made with a pocketable design and premium metal finish, now witness supreme sound meet phenomenal design.
item.content:encoded: Start your journey of a truly immersive wireless experience with Airdopes Genesis. Featuring a playback of 54 hours and ASAP Charge it gets you a never-ending immersive experience with boAt Signature sound coming from its powerful 13mm drivers. With seamless in-ear detection and quad mics with ENx Technology, get flawless clear calling whether it’s a work call or personal chit-chat. Made with a pocketable design and premium metal finish, now witness supreme sound meet phenomenal design.
